metadata.title: Nauta - The AI-Native Operating System For Global Supply Chains
metadata.description: AI-powered logistics intelligence for a world that never stops

footer.tagline: AI-powered logistics intelligence for a world that never stops.

sections.heading: The AI-Native Operating System For Global Supply Chains

visual.subject: Multiple 3D cargo container ships with parallax scroll animation
visual.visualDescription: Three blue/white cargo ships with colored containers (orange, red, blue) sailing on blue ocean surface under light blue gradient sky. Ship 1 (left): Orange/brown hull with blue containers. Ship 2 (center): White hull with red containers. Ship 3 (right): White hull with mixed blue/red containers.
visual.observedBehavior: Ships move horizontally and vertically at different speeds creating multi-layer parallax depth effect as user scrolls. Left ship moves slowest (0.3x scroll speed), center ship at medium speed (0.5x), right ship fastest (0.7x). Total travel distance: left -50px horizontal/+90px vertical, center -100px/+145px, right -150px/+200px over first 440px of scroll.
visual.technicalImplementation: HTML5 Canvas (#hero-img, 1536x730px) with WebGL/Three.js rendering 3D GLTF ship models. GSAP ScrollTrigger controls parallax animation with scrub: true for smooth scroll-linked movement.
visual.propertyChanges: Ship models: translateX (-15px to -150px depending on layer), translateY (+25px to +200px), parallax ratio 1:1.5:2.2 (foreground:mid:background). Animation speed: 1.1px/scroll-px (layer 1), 2.2px/scroll-px (layer 2), 3.3px/scroll-px (layer 3).

visual.subject: Complex multi-element port logistics scene with extensive 3D detail
visual.visualDescription: Complete port facility scene with: Container truck (white cab, blue trailer), blue tower crane with extended boom, stacked containers (2-3 high, blue/orange colors), modern warehouse building (white/orange, right edge), 2-3 worker figures in orange safety vests, cargo planes/drones at viewport edges, forklifts, and original ships continuing in background for continuity.
visual.observedBehavior: Full scene replacement animation: hero ships fade out (opacity 1→0.3) and move up while port scene fades in (opacity 0→1) and enters from bottom. All port elements have individual parallax speeds creating 4-5 distinct depth layers. Scene transition occurs over 320px scroll distance (440px→760px). Ships remain visible in background ensuring smooth visual continuity.
visual.technicalImplementation: WebGL/Three.js scene with multiple GLTF/GLB 3D models (truck, crane, containers, warehouse, workers). Parallax scroll controller manages layer speeds. Scene opacity crossfade using GSAP timeline. Z-index layering for depth (foreground elements higher z-index).
visual.propertyChanges: Hero scene: opacity 1→0.3, translateY continuing upward. Port scene: opacity 0→1, individual elements translateY from y=1400px (offscreen) to y=620-720px (viewport center). Truck: ΔY +680px entry. Crane: ΔY +580px. Warehouse: ΔY +450px. Workers: ΔY +500px. Each element has unique parallax speed.

elements.description: Blue tower crane with extended boom
White cab container truck with blue semi-trailer
Stacked shipping containers, 2-3 high, mixed blue/orange
Modern white/orange building with multiple windows, right edge
2-3 small human figures in orange safety vests near containers
Forklifts and port equipment scattered in scene
Small aircraft/drone models at viewport edges

sections.text: Nauta connects, predicts, and automates every system unifying fragmented information into a single intelligent network that delivers SKU-level insights for real-time decisions in global trade

visual.observedBehavior: Text fades in over 3D port scene as user scrolls. Opacity animates from 0 to 1 over 320px scroll distance with effective duration ~0.8s.
visual.propertyChanges: Text overlay: opacity 0→1.0, translateY +320px (fade+slide up from y=1000px to y=680px)

sections.heading: The AI-Native Operating System For Global Supply Chains
sections.subheading: Nauta connects, predicts, and automates every system unifying fragmented information into a single intelligent network that delivers SKU-level insights for real-time decisions in global trade

visual.observedBehavior: Large heading fades in first, followed by subheading with 0.2s delay. Both text elements scale from 0.8 to 1.0 during fade-in creating subtle zoom effect.
visual.propertyChanges: Heading: opacity 0→1, scale 0.8→1.0, translateY +320px (y=1100px to y=780px). Subheading: opacity 0→1, translateY +280px (y=1100px to y=820px), delay 0.2s.

sections.heading: Working with distributors of global brands

visual.observedBehavior: Logos appear one by one with 0.15s stagger delay between each. Scene transitions from blue 3D port background to white/cream clean background.
visual.propertyChanges: Background: #E8EDF7 (blue) → #FFFFFF (white), fade duration 1.2s. Logos: opacity 0→1, translateY +365px (y=1100px to y=735px), stagger 0.15s per logo.

sections.heading: The data you own, supercharged with AI

visual.observedBehavior: Large headline text animates in word by word or character by character with color segments creating visual hierarchy.

connectionLines.style: radial from center to all nodes

visual.subject: Interactive integration network diagram with 18+ connected nodes
visual.visualDescription: Dark navy background (#1A1F4A) with white Nauta logo at center. 18 labeled boxes (nodes) arranged in radial/spoke pattern around center. White dotted/dashed lines connect all nodes to central logo. Modern tech diagram aesthetic with clean typography.
visual.observedBehavior: Connection lines animate from center outward using SVG path drawing technique (strokeDashoffset). Nodes fade in with 0.1s stagger creating wave effect. Total animation duration ~2s. Likely hover effects on nodes (highlight + tooltip).
visual.technicalImplementation: SVG paths with stroke-dasharray and stroke-dashoffset animation. GSAP timeline controls sequential line drawing and node fade-in. Interactive hover states with tooltips.
visual.propertyChanges: Connection lines: stroke-dashoffset 1000→0, duration 2s, sequential stagger 0.1s. Nodes: opacity 0→1, translateY varies by position (top y=1050px→730px, middle y=1100px→780px, bottom y=1150px→830px), stagger 0.1s.

paragraphs: Nauta makes an operator's own data actionable - orchestrating insights across every email, document, and partner. In logistics, every container tells a story and no two journeys are alike meaning the volume of data grows every hour of the day.

With the predictive intelligence delivered by Nauta, operators benefit from insights into ongoing operations enabling them to capitalize on trends and opportunities while staying ahead of - and mitigating - risks and penalties.

visual.observedBehavior: Text blocks fade in with subtle slide-up effect (30-50px translation). CTA button appears after text with slight delay.
visual.propertyChanges: Paragraphs: opacity 0→1, translateY +365px (y=1100px to y=735px), duration 0.8s. CTA button: opacity 0→1, delay 0.4s.

features.heading: Go beyond visualization
features.description: Gain operational resilience through data centralization, boosting productivity, gaining control over inventory, and unlocking real-time decision making for importers.

illustration.subject: Truck with container

features.heading: Expand Margins
features.description: Gain control of cash flow, inventory, and costs. Automate repetitive, manual tasks, increase negotiating power with partners, and reduce operational risk.

visual.subject: 4 feature cards with 3D isometric illustrations in horizontal scroll layout
visual.visualDescription: Light blue/gray gradient background (#E8EDF7). Four white cards with rounded corners and drop shadows. Each card contains 3D isometric illustration at top, heading below, and description text. Illustrations use white/blue color scheme with professional 3D rendering.
visual.observedBehavior: Cards slide in from right as user scrolls down. Horizontal scroll behavior: cards positioned side-by-side, revealing 640px rightward per viewport scroll. 3D illustrations have subtle 5-10deg Y-axis tilt effect. Card animation staggers with 0.2s delay between cards.
visual.technicalImplementation: Horizontal scroll snap container or Swiper.js carousel. GSAP horizontal scroll animation with scrub. 3D illustrations likely have rotateY transform on scroll/hover.
visual.propertyChanges: Cards: translateX +640px (horizontal slide-in from x=1920px, 2560px, 3200px, 3840px to viewport). Illustrations: rotateY +5deg tilt on scroll. Stagger: 0.2s between card reveals.

sections.heading: Secure, continuous data ingestion
sections.description: Through the power of AI, key information is automatically drawn directly from emails, documents, and partner platforms meaning operators save time and start each day steps ahead

visual.subject: Email interface showing container shipping notification from Atlas Ocean Lines with AI data extraction visualization
visual.visualDescription: White email card overlaying navy gradient background (#121B4A→#1A2B5A). Nauta logo icon at top center. Diagonal dotted lines connecting logo to email suggesting AI extraction. Email shows: sender 'Atlas Ocean Lines' with logo, subject line with container number 'MSCU1234567', departure date '16 August 2025' highlighted in blue, status 'Customs cleared - awaiting boarding', timestamp '8:23PM (1 day ago)'.
visual.observedBehavior: Email animates in from top (fade + translateY -30px→0). Dotted connection lines draw from Nauta icon to highlighted data fields using SVG strokeDashoffset animation. Data points (container number, date) highlight sequentially with background color pulse effect.
visual.technicalImplementation: GSAP timeline with staggered animations: email fade-in (opacity 0→1, y: -30→0, duration 0.6s) → SVG path strokeDashoffset (1000→0, duration 1s) → sequential highlight of data points (background pulse, duration 0.4s each, stagger 0.2s)
visual.propertyChanges: Email card: opacity 0→1, translateY -30px→0. Connection lines: stroke-dashoffset 1000→0 (drawing effect). Container number highlight: background rgba(78,115,214,0.1)→0.2, duration 0.4s. Date highlight: same effect, delay 0.2s. Nauta logo glow: opacity 0→0.8, blur 0→20px.

visual.subject: BILL OF LADING document card with data field connections
visual.visualDescription: White document card on dark navy gradient (#1A2654→#0F1937). Nauta logo at top center with radiating light effect. BILL OF LADING title (caps, right side). Document shows: EverBright Shipping Corp. carrier logo (star icon), Carrier: Oceanic Freight Lines Ltd., Consignee: Fashion Imports LLC (1321 Hudson Street, Newark, NJ), Vessel: M/V Horizon Spirit / VOY-5825, Port of Loading: Manzanillo Mexico / MAZ-U2, Port of Unloading: New York USA / USNYC1. Dotted connection lines (light gray #E5E7EB) linking data fields.
visual.observedBehavior: Document card fades in from top with slight scale effect (0.95→1). Dotted lines animate from Nauta logo outward to data fields creating connection visualization. Nauta logo has glowing halo effect.
visual.technicalImplementation: GSAP timeline: document card scale+fade (opacity 0→1, scale 0.95→1, duration 0.8s) → SVG line strokeDashoffset (500→0, stagger 0.15s per line) → logo glow (opacity 0→0.8, blur 0→20px)
visual.propertyChanges: Document card: opacity 0→1, scale 0.95→1. Connection lines: strokeDashoffset 500→0, stagger 0.15s. Nauta logo glow: opacity 0→0.8, blur 0→20px.

sections.heading: Product-level control
sections.description: Quickly access the first and only dataset built from the individual traders' product-level activity. Follow and act on the real-time status of each container available on-demand, no time lost hunting for the latest.

visual.subject: Real-time shipping route tracker with animated vessel movement
visual.visualDescription: World map (light gray/blue #E8EDF7 background, blue #5B8CDE continents) showing Istanbul to Los Angeles route. White dotted path line with slight glow. Three white triangular ship markers (▷) along route. Information card (white, right side 40% width): container icon header, SKU: PAN-TRQ-1KG-GRN, Container: #7, Vessel: St Vincent 7, From/To: Istanbul→Los Angeles, progress bar (black to red gradient #000000→#FF6635, ~70% filled), status badge 'Containers delayed vs last week' with -3% indicator (light red background, red text). Play button icon (suggesting animation control).
visual.observedBehavior: Ship icons animate along dotted path using SVG motionPath animation. Ships move continuously in loop (auto-play). Progress bar fills dynamically when section enters viewport. Status updates appear to be real-time data. Play button pulses on idle.
visual.technicalImplementation: SVG path for route with GSAP motionPath for ship movement. Progress bar animated with GSAP width transition. Potential WebSocket/polling for real-time status updates. Play button has pulse animation (infinite loop).
visual.propertyChanges: Ship markers: offset-path animation 0%→100% along SVG path, duration 8-10s, repeat infinite. Progress bar: width 0%→70%, duration 1.5s. Status badge: opacity 0→1, scale 0.9→1, duration 0.5s. Play button: scale 1→1.1, pulse infinite.

sections.heading: The proof is in every container
sections.subheading: Nauta delivers data, agility and trust that drives measurable ROI

visual.subject: Animated counter statistics with directional icons
visual.visualDescription: 2×3 grid layout on white background. Each stat block contains: large number (72-96px, weight 700, dark navy #121B4A), description (16-18px, gray #6B7280), and icon (24×24px, orange arrow down #FF6635 or blue arrow up/up-right #4E73D6). Generous spacing between blocks (~60px vertical, ~80px horizontal).
visual.observedBehavior: Numbers animate from 0 to target value using counter effect (duration ~2s with easing). Icons fade in with scale/bounce effect, staggered 0.15s between items.
visual.trigger: scroll position ~13240-13880px (stats section enter at top 70%)
visual.technicalImplementation: GSAP textContent animation for counters with snap to integer. Icon entrance with back.out easing for bounce effect. Stagger delays create wave pattern.
visual.propertyChanges: Numbers: textContent 0→target, duration 2s, stagger 0.2s, ease power1.out. Icons: opacity 0→1, scale 0.8→1, duration 0.6s, stagger 0.15s, ease back.out(1.7).

testimonials.quote: Using Nauta, we identified a specific company responsible for over 70% of our detention and demurrage costs...
Nauta has transformed internal operations: smoother workflows, less manual tracking, better visibility into performance metrics...

One of the hardest parts for us is ensuring the equipment we need doesn't run out of stock. With Nauta's centralized visibility, we now have more accurate estimates and our fill rate has improved from 74% to 90%.

visual.observedBehavior: Testimonial cards fade in with left→center→right stagger. Author cards (with photos/logos) appear below quotes with additional fade-in delay.
visual.propertyChanges: Cards: opacity 0→1, translateY +50px, stagger 0.3s left-to-right. Author info: opacity 0→1, delay 0.5s after quote card.

sections.heading: Don't miss out on the opportunity for AI to boost your efficiency and drive business growth

illustration.subject: 3D isometric warehouse facility with logistics operations
illustration.visualDescription: Blue gradient banner (#5B8CDE→#4E73D6). Right side: isometric warehouse scene with white buildings with blue roofs, orange/blue stacked containers (2-3 high), blue container trucks, forklifts with orange equipment, pine trees surrounding facility, partial ship view (blue/white) on right edge. Clean 3D flat style with drop shadows, white platforms.
illustration.observedBehavior: 3D warehouse illustration has subtle parallax on scroll (moves slower than page scroll creating depth). Possible micro-animations: containers/forklifts have gentle continuous tilt or rotation.
illustration.propertyChanges: Illustration: translateY -50px (parallax, scrub 1). Optional continuous animations: rotationY 0→5deg, duration 3s, repeat -1, yoyo true.
